title: Game-Based Vocabulary Acquisition Program for Learners with Dyslexia

context.additional_context: Blended learning combining game-based activities with digital devices (tablets/laptops) and weekly offline feedback sessions

learning_goals: Learners can acquire 15 new social-domain vocabulary items per week for four weeks through game-based learning.
Using a spaced repetition system, learners can retain over 75% of vocabulary in long-term memory after three months.
Learners can maintain over 80% motivation in vocabulary acquisition through visual/auditory game mechanisms tailored to dyslexia characteristics.

resources: Game-based learning platform (custom versions of Anki, Quizlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
